attributes.action: Replace Boris Johnson with Jeremy Corbyn as a matter of urgency due to COVID-19.
attributes.additional_details: Contact Her Majesty the Queen and ask her to step in to dissolve government and replace with Jeremy Corbyn to save the country.
attributes.background: In light of the COVID-19 pandemic and inaction by current Tory government, millions may die in the coming weeks. Boris Johnson government is incapable of running the country, millions of people in risk of death, the country is facing apocalypse. We urgently need socialist leader Jeremy Corbyn.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours and appointments, which includes calling for a change in Prime Minister.

We have published a petition calling for an emergency National Unity Government, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301563
